macro_markets.query: What are the most important macroeconomic and stock market news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include major index movements, Fed/central bank news, and significant company earnings or announcements.

items.title: US Equities Volatile Amid Geopolitical Tensions and Fed Concerns
items.summary: The S&P 500 declined 0.3-0.36%, Dow fell 0.53%, and Nasdaq slipped 0.06% last week, driven by geopolitical tensions, dip-buying, and volatility from Fed independence concerns. VIX briefly exceeded 20.

items.title: Intel Shares Plunge 17% on Disappointing Guidance and AI Chip Challenges
items.summary: Intel's stock dropped as much as 17% on Friday after weak guidance and struggles meeting AI chip demand. Four Magnificent Seven tech giants—Microsoft, Meta, Tesla, Apple—set to report earnings this week.

items.title: Tesla Surges 4% on Elon Musk's FSD, Robotaxi, and Optimus Announcements at Davos
items.summary: Tesla CEO Elon Musk announced full self-driving approval in Europe and China by February, US robotaxi deployment by year-end, and Optimus consumer rollout by 2027 end, boosting shares 4% Thursday.

items.title: S&P 500 Earnings Growth to Drive 2026 Gains, Tech Expected to Fuel 60% of EPS
items.summary: S&P 500 returns increasingly fueled by earnings growth (84% in 2025), with 15% EPS growth forecast for 2026 led by tech (60%) and financials. Consumer sentiment at 56.4, manufacturing PMI at 51.9.

items.title: Upcoming FOMC Meeting and Q4 GDP in Focus as US Index Futures Decline
items.summary: FOMC meeting and 4Q GDP data loom ahead; US stock futures down at week start with S&P 500 futures -0.3% and Nasdaq-100 futures -0.5%. Hang Seng consolidated near 26,800, Japan 225 recovered.

crypto_news.query: What are the most significant cryptocurrency and blockchain news from the past 24 hours? Include major price movements, regulatory news, and notable project developments.

items.title: Global Crypto Market Cap Drops 1.11% to $2.99T Amid Broad Declines
items.summary: The cryptocurrency market capitalization fell to $2.99 trillion, down 1.11% in the last 24 hours, with Bitcoin trading at $87,807 (-0.73%) and Ethereum at $2,890 (-1.53%). Major assets like Solana (-3.36%) and others saw losses, though RESOLV (+28%), AUCTION (+27%), and DODO (+15%) outperformed.

items.title: Bitcoin Tests Below $87,000 on U.S. Government Shutdown Fears
items.summary: Bitcoin dipped below $87,000 and Ethereum below $2,800 due to risks of a new U.S. government shutdown by week's end, triggering $677 million in futures liquidations mostly from long positions. The Fear and Greed Index hit 20, signaling extreme fear.

items.title: Japan Plans to Legalize Crypto ETFs by 2028 as Regulatory Momentum Builds
items.summary: Japan aims to legalize cryptocurrency ETFs by 2028 amid accelerating regulatory developments in Asia, while the UK nears completion of crypto regulation consultations. Global crypto sector secured over $222 million in funding last week.

items.title: Crypto Sell-Off Erases Most 2026 Gains; Gold Hits $5,000 Record
items.summary: Digital currencies sold off sharply, with Bitcoin flat YTD (-5% last week) and Ether down 2% YTD (-7% last week), amid stock market volatility and U.S. trade concerns. Gold outperformed, surpassing $5,000 per ounce, while silver topped $110.

items.title: Solana Attracts Major Stablecoin Inflows as Ethereum Supply Drops
items.summary: Solana experienced significant stablecoin inflows contrasting with declining Ethereum supply, while BNB Chain's growth boosts demand for fixed-rate DeFi products. Institutional investors view Bitcoin as undervalued per survey.

items.title: Bitcoin Bears in Command After Five-Week Low
items.summary: February Bitcoin futures firmed slightly in early trading after hitting a five-week low overnight, with bears dominating amid broader market pressures.

ai_news.query: What are the most important artificial intelligence and machine learning news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include new model releases, company announcements, research breakthroughs, and industry trends.

items.title: Sandia National Labs AI Agents Achieve Fourfold Improvement in LED Steering
items.summary: Researchers at the Department of Energy's Sandia National Labs developed domain-specific AI agents that completed over 300 tests in five hours and discovered a novel LED light-steering approach four times better than methods developed by human researchers. The work was published in Nature Communications.

items.title: New Jersey Signs AI Agreement with Nvidia, Commits $25M to Statewide Supercomputer
items.summary: Governor Murphy announced a partnership between New Jersey, Nvidia, and state universities including NJIT, Princeton, and Rutgers to develop a statewide AI supercomputer. The state legislature approved a $25 million investment to support AI research and education infrastructure.

items.title: Stellar Cyber Launches Agentic AI-Powered Autonomous SOC Platform 6.3
items.summary: Stellar Cyber released version 6.3 of its security operations platform featuring agentic AI capabilities that reduce analyst workload by over 80% and false positives by over 90%. The platform automates security incident response and integrates with multiple endpoint and cloud security tools.

items.title: AWS Launches EC2 G7e Instances with Nvidia Blackwell GPUs
items.summary: Amazon Web Services announced new graphics and AI inference instances powered by Nvidia's latest Blackwell architecture for GPU-intensive workloads.

items.title: ERP Systems Poised for Major AI-Driven Transformation in 2026
items.summary: Industry analysts predict that agentic AI will automate core ERP functionality in finance, procurement, and supply chain management, with AI shifting from transactional systems to autonomous, insight-driven engines that recommend and execute decisions within defined guardrails.

items.title: McKinsey Report: AI Agents and Robots Reshaping Future of Work
items.summary: A McKinsey Global Institute report envisions a three-way partnership among people, AI-powered agents, and robots in the workplace. The report notes that organizations like Mayo Clinic have doubled their radiology staff while implementing hundreds of AI systems.

items.title: Datavault AI Supports International Real-World Asset Tokenization Research Center in Taiwan
items.summary: Datavault AI announced support for establishing the RWA International Research Center at St. John's University in Taipei to advance research in real-world asset tokenization, regulatory technology, and applied financial innovation.

items.title: Nvidia and CoreWeave Strengthen Collaboration on AI Factories
items.summary: Nvidia and CoreWeave announced an expanded partnership to accelerate the buildout of AI infrastructure and computing facilities.

gaming.query: What are the most notable video game and gaming industry news from the past 24 hours? Include game releases, announcements, esports, and industry developments.

tech_news.query: What are the most important technology news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include major product launches, company news, and significant tech industry developments. Exclude AI-specific news.
